#summary Instalation instructions

= Introduction =

This document is intened to give information about instalation of the script.



= Details =

=== The script itself ===
The script is intended to by self executable so you will have to modify its permissions
{{{
chmod +x vsftpd_denyhost.py
}}}

=== Execution ===
Execution is left for the cron to do the job. Just setup your crontab to execute the script as many times per hour as you wish.
